abstract: Research by comScore is being highlighted by Facebook to show that ads there offer a “return on investment.”
snippet: Research by comScore is being highlighted by Facebook to show that ads there offer a “return on investment.”
lead_paragraph: After taking a beating during its initial public offering over questions about whether its ad-focused business model is solid enough for the company to succeed on a $100 billion scale, Facebook is in a hurry to offer up new data to prove that its ads do, in fact, work.

headline.main: Facebook Tries to Prove Ads Work
